definitions.definition: Water or other liquid finely suspended in air.
definitions.example: It was difficult to see through the morning mist.

definitions.definition: A layer of fine droplets or particles.
definitions.example: There was an oily mist on the lens.

definitions.definition: Anything that dims, darkens, or hinders vision.
To spray fine droplets on, particularly of water.
definitions.example: I mist my tropical plants every morning.

definitions.definition: (of the eyes) To be covered by tears.
definitions.example: My eyes misted when I remembered what had happened.
